title: Last chance to get a CA postmark until fall
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Last chance to get a CA postmark until fall
posts.post_content:
Five lovely duplicates remain in my winter inventory for sale, not counting the cars.

I am listing these, some for the second time, and will take them with me back to WI for the summer, but will be leaving in 2 weeks from CA.

#1 Donie Bush - BVG 3

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10080/bush[/IMG]

#2 Al Orth SL - SGC 40

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/23473/orth-sl[/IMG]

#3 Fred Payne - SGC 40

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10288/payne[/IMG]

#4 John McGraw Glove at Hip (No Finger) - BVG 1.5

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10159/mcgraw-hip-hof[/IMG]

#5 Art Devlin - BVG 3

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10094/devlin[/IMG]

Prices (no fee payment) include shipping

Bush $40
Orth $75
Payne SOLD
McGraw $60
Devlin $40

Take 'em all for $250.

If you like the card but not the price, name your own.

13% off listed prices if you can figure that out for the next 24 hours only.


This phenomenal 24 hour offer has now expired.

PM sent for #3 Fred Payne - SGC 40


Thanks,
James
